mapper.select: select p.prd_name, p.prd_brand, p.price, p.rating, p.baumann_id, b.type as baumann_type from product p join baumann b on p.baumann_id = b.baumann_id where p.prd_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or p.prd_brand like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or p.ingredient like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or b.type like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
